page.title: 03EDUCATION (1)
page.content:
TOREAGH PRIMARY SCHOOL
The only school in our area is Toreagh Primary School. It was built in 1968 to replace the old school at the crossways at Raloo. It is a small school, with two full time teachers and one part time teacher. There are thirty one children in the school. Four of the children are 4\ years old, five are five years old, six are six, one is seven. There are four children aged eight, four aged nine, one aged ten and six aged eleven Mrs McCarlie is the principal of the school. Miss Craig is the assistant teacher and Mrs Charters teaches two afternoons per week. The school provides full time education in all subjects. The childrenalso have swimming lessons at the Tower Pool in Larne.
